definition: (coll.) to gain profit (usu. by underhand means)
to fish up/to dredge up

water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to stuff one's pockets/to take bribes
lucrative job/cushy job

to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
to get money/to accumulate money
to fish for/to seek profit (by improper means)
lucrative post
to be corrupt/corruption/to embezzle

to buy a title/to use wealth to acquire office
